exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ¦œã€€ã€€å•  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    'äººæ°”',
    'ç‚¹å‡»',
    'è®¢é˜…',
    'è¯„è®º',
    'åæ§½'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v1/comic1/rank_list?page={{page}}&size=10&duration=1&cate=${parseInt(i) + 1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ ‡ã€€ã€€ç­¾  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/api/v1/comic1/filter_type';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.theme;
Audience = `{{get('audience',Get('o'))}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('p'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('q'))}}`;
Sort = `{{get('sort',Get('r'))}}`;
FirstLetter = `{{get('firstLetter',Get('s'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v1/comic1/filter?sortType=${Sort}&page={{page}}&size=18&status=${Status}&audience=${Audience}&theme=${kind[i].id}&cate=${Cate}&firstLetter${FirstLetter}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].name, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('ä»£ç†ï¼š').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    if (baseUrl.includes('rank_list')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        var HOT = ['äººæ°”:','ç‚¹å‡»:','è®¢é˜…:','è¯„è®º:','åæ§½:'];
        var index = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*cate=/, ''));
        for (i in list) {
            var hot = HOT[index - 1] + Num(list[i].num);
            var tags = list[i].status.replace(/[ä¸­å·²]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].readergroup + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': hot + ',' + tags,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest + 'ã€”' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)) + 'ã€•',
                'intro': list[i].description,
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url') + '/api/v1/comic1/comic/detail?comic_py=' + list[i].comic_py
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)$/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.list[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.comicList;
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[ä¸­å·²]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url') + '/api/v1/comic1/comic/detail?comic_py=' + list[i].comic_py
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)$/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.comicList[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>
